message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the task of automatic description generation from natural images, which is a combination of computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also introduces a sequential guiding network that guides the decoder during word generation, which falls under the category of sequence modeling and generation. Hence, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is also a likely sub-category. The paper proposes a new model that can be trained in an end-to-end manner using image/descriptions pairs, which involves deep learning techniques such as attention and LSTM. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are also possible sub-categories. Finally, the paper validates its approach on a benchmark dataset, which involves information retrieval and evaluation, making cs.IR (Information Retrieval) a possible sub-category as well.
